agency_name: Virginia Freedom of Information Advisory Council
series_description: This series documents the written opinions produced and published by the Freedom of Information Advisory Council members that provide the advice, guidance, and clarification that encourages and facilitates compliance with the Freedom Information Act. This series includes published opinions

agency_name: Virginia Freedom of Information Advisory Council
series_description: This series documents the informal, unpublished advice, opinions, and guidance that Freedom of Information Council staff members provide to citizens, state and local and media representatives. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence and logs.
retention_statement: 2 Years after end of calendar year
